title: Rekohornan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An ecological 100% organic deli, takeaway and store in the center of the city. Menu has vegan items and a daily changing lunch. Has green smoothies and Italian coffee. Owners are vegan and happy to meet and chat with other vegans. Since they come from Italy, lots of Italian organic brands are offered in the store area and the food is mainly Italian. Serves meat only because they might not get enough income otherwise.
